metadata.name: Leap of Faith
metadata.description:
As the owner of 'Leap of Faith' you will; 

1} Hold an exquisite 1/1 photograph shot by Adam and edited by Eva
2}  Hold a 1/1 cinematic composition, written and recorded exclusively for this image by Adam {Los Angeles music producer}

When all 15 'Her Persistence of Vision' NFTs are collected, you will receive the full length soundtrack featuring all the original compositions written for this collection. Your name will be included in the title of this song. 

5 images from this collection will be dropped every 2 weeks.

At the conclusion of all 15 auctions, a live performance of the top selling NFTs will take place in Los Angeles. All collectors will receive a private invitation to experience this unprecedented performance, in person. This NFT performance will stream live to all BIDDERS and COLLECTORS.

You will receive a WAV file of the song and highest resolution image, to be airdropped at the conclusion of the auction.
